ygData.subject: Re: News from EQVault
ygData.msgSnippet: I suspect there will still be one song per level ..... minus the songs to add growth ( wee with sarcasm ) I think this is the time to help the developers get
ygData.messageBody:
I suspect there will still be one song per level ..... minus the songs to
add growth ( wee with sarcasm )

I think this is the time to help the developers get creative and offer up
suggestions for songs and help control are own destiny

The more realistic the song ( an uber invoice see invis all in one song
would not be unbalancing ) the better the chance some developer will take
credit for it and we will get it

I suspect thoughts like a non mana 1000 hit per tic dot would not be
considered. But what the heck who knows what a level 80 mob will be like

condra


-----Original Message-----
From: Brangwen <brangwen@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, November 14, 1999 1:05 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] News from EQVault


>From: "Brangwen" <brangwen@...>
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>>
>> Why are there no Bard Songs for Bard levels 39, 45, 47 and 49?
>> When we was finishing up the Bard class, we wanted to leave some room for
>> expansion during the evolution of EverQuest. Because Bards get one song
>per
>> level, if we had given them all fifty songs there would have been no room
>> for expansion - aside from taking away older songs.
>>
>> Expect to see new songs coming soon. These songs will not be anything
that
>> radically redefines the Bard class - but they will be additions that help
>> keep the Bard interesting at high levels.
>>
>> Thanks Geoffrey!
>
>So does this mean they are NOT going to have new songs for the levels over
>50??? That seems odd to me if it is the case.
>
>Brangwen
>L19 (ALMOST L20 - 2/3 a b away from it - *drool drool*)
>The Rathe
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
